data.eml:eml: Two new species of Olecryptotendipes Zorina, 2007 from China (Diptera, Chironomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yan, Chun-Cai, Wang, Xin-Hua, Bu, Wen-Jun (2012): Two new species of Olecryptotendipes Zorina, 2007 from China (Diptera, Chironomidae). ZooKeys 208: 41-49, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.208.3299, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.208.3299
